Name: Verify Industrial Building Automation Overview Page
Description: Navigate to the Industrial Building Automation Overview page from the home menu. Select the desired language and perform a search. Verify the displayed search results page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://www-int.itg.ti.com/
step 2: Click on link 'Menu'
step 3: Click on link 'Applications'
step 4: Click on link 'Industrial'
step 5: Click on list  -> Navigate to page 'applications/industrial/building-automation/overview.html'
step 6: Click on link 'Language'
step 7: Click on ti
step 8: Click on link 'Search'
step 9: Click on atomic 'headerSearchBox' -> Navigate to page 'sitesearch/en-us/docs/universalsearch.tsp'
step 10: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Adding Tax in Checkout Profile
Description: Navigate to the checkout profile web tax page. Add tax and verify the successful addition.
Test Steps:

step 2: Click on ti
step 3: Click on ti  -> Navigate to page 'checkoutprofile/web/tax/add'
step 4: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
